items.title: Smart Cockpit Solution
items.description: Combines visual perception and intelligent voice technology to automatically detect traffic violations and enable an in-vehicle office experience.

items.title: Hybrid AI Service Desk
items.description: Utilises a crowdsourcing model and RNN intent recognition algorithm to support 20,000 daily consultations, serving over 50 international enterprises and creating 110,000 job opportunities.

items.title: Warehouse Video Intelligent Inspection
items.description: A computer vision-based intelligent inspection system for warehouses, successfully sold 50,000 units while saving $24M annually.
